title: TeamInferno - Looking for players of lower ranks wanting to improve
body:
Hey guys.

I've made this team with the hope of improving personally and I'm here on the forums looking for people who also want to improve.
Rank really doesn't matter, the most important things are teamwork and the will to improve!
If you are interested, add me in game (IGN: Spiriti) and send me a message telling me you want to give this a shot.

Thanks :)

replies.body: You can add me if you like just getting back into it after a long break so very much looking to improve, can play all roles well except adc, big champ pool, and available most arvo's, add if interested

Level 26
Play daily
I rek all lanes

TheChadMizer

Lately I've been looking to improve on some things too, I main support, I play top and mid too. I just need to work on my jungle and adc. Currently B3 so you can see I'm not exactly the best :p feel free to add me :)

I was just about to post something very similar i play with 2 others and we need an adc and top laner to complete the team 
We have played together for years and are looking for 2 more to join in
ok my league name is demonflux957
Spiriti i would like to join you the only thing is that i am not level 30 yet
Just give me an add anyway, we can play a few games together if you'd like :)
